title: Tour de France Confirms Wild Twist on Paris Finale: Montmartre Climb Added to Stage 21
content:
Tour de France organizers throw a firework into love-or-hate traditional sprint stage with inclusion of paved climb used in 2024 Olympics.

Read the full article at Tour de France Confirms Wild Twist on Paris Finale: Montmartre Climb Added to Stage 21 on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
